Package order

Class InvoiceIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.InvoiceIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Exportable, Importable
    public class InvoiceIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements Exportable, Importable
    This class serves as a wrapper and translator for an ArrayList of Invoice objects for import and export from and to a CSV file.
